# GoldenWing Creative Studios

> GoldenWing is a full-service creative and digital agency headquartered in Vienna, Austria, with offices in Dubai (UAE) and Roseville, California (USA). We specialize in branding, web design, SEO, digital marketing, and web development for businesses across the DACH region (Germany, Austria, Switzerland) and internationally. Founded in 2014, we've completed 250+ projects with a 98% client satisfaction rate.

## Key Facts

- **Founded:** 2014 in Vienna, Austria
- **Team:** 10+ specialists (designers, developers, marketing experts)
- **Headquarters:** Czeikestrasse 4/21, 1100 Vienna, Austria
- **Languages:** German (primary), English
- **Industries:** Healthcare, Legal, E-Commerce, B2B, Startups, Hospitality, Real Estate
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js, React, TypeScript, Payload CMS, Tailwind CSS

## Services

- [Web Design](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/webdesign): Custom responsive websites, UI/UX design, landing pages, e-commerce design, and design systems
- [SEO & Content](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/seo-content): Technical SEO audits, on-page optimization, content strategy, local SEO (Vienna, DACH), and link building
- [Digital Marketing](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/digital-marketing): Google Ads, Meta Ads, social media marketing, email marketing, and conversion optimization
- [Branding](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/branding): Brand strategy, logo design, visual identity, corporate identity systems, and brand guidelines
- [Web & App Development](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/web-app-entwicklung): Custom web applications, e-commerce (Shopify, WooCommerce), CMS implementation, and API development
- [IT & Cloud Services](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/it-cloud-services): Cloud architecture (AWS, Google Cloud), DevOps, security audits, and hosting

## Service Packages

- [Brand & Web Foundation](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/pakete/brand-web-foundation): Complete branding + website package for startups and new businesses
- [SEO & Content Growth](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/pakete/seo-content-growth): Monthly SEO optimization and content creation package
- [Demand Gen Suite](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/pakete/demand-gen-suite): Full digital marketing package including ads, content, and analytics
- [Custom Package](https://goldenwing.at/de/leistungen/pakete/individuelles-paket): Tailored solution based on your specific needs

## Free Website Tools

- [Website Analyzer](https://goldenwing.at/de/tools/website-analyzer): Comprehensive website audit combining SEO, performance, design, and security checks with overall score
- [SEO Checker](https://goldenwing.at/de/tools/seo-checker): Analyze meta tags, headings, schema markup, and sitemap for SEO issues
- [Performance Checker](https://goldenwing.at/de/tools/performance-checker): Core Web Vitals analysis via Google PageSpeed API
- [Design Analyzer](https://goldenwing.at/de/tools/design-analyzer): Check responsive design, favicons, and Open Graph tags
- [Security Checker](https://goldenwing.at/de/tools/security-checker): HTTPS, SSL certificate, and security headers validation

- [Vienna (Headquarters)](https://goldenwing.at/de/standorte/wien): Czeikestrasse 4/21, 1100 Wien, Austria
- [Dubai](https://goldenwing.at/de/standorte/dubai): DAMAC Executive Bay Tower B, Office 1406, Business Bay
- [Roseville, CA](https://goldenwing.at/de/standorte/roseville): 2700 N Hayden Pkwy, Roseville, CA 95747, USA
